statements: SELECT * FROM asset_movements;
SELECT asset_id, movement_type FROM asset_movements ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset_movements WHERE to_location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT asset_id, movement_date FROM asset_movements WHERE movement_type = 'Transfer' AND movement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT from_location FROM asset_movements ORDER BY from_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM asset_movements WHERE movement_type = 'Transfer';
SELECT asset_id, movement_type, movement_date FROM asset_movements WHERE from_location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT asset_id, movement_type, to_location FROM asset_movements WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT asset_id, movement_type, from_location, to_location FROM asset_movements WHERE asset_id = 1001 AND movement_type = 'Maintenance' ORDER BY movement_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT movement_type FROM asset_movements WHERE from_location = 'Warehouse B';
SELECT * FROM asset_movements WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_id, movement_date, from_location FROM asset_movements WHERE to_location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT movement_type, movement_reason FROM asset_movements WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM asset_transfers WHERE transfer_date > '2022-04-01';
SELECT asset_id, transfer_date, transfer_reason FROM asset_transfers WHERE from_user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM asset_movements WHERE movement_type = 'Transfer';
SELECT asset_id, movement_date, from_location, to_location FROM asset_movements ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT asset_id, to_location, movement_type FROM asset_movements WHERE movement_type = 'Disposal' AND to_location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY to_location ASC, movement_date DESC;
SELECT asset_id, movement_date, to_location FROM asset_movements WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01' AND movement_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM asset_transfers WHERE transfer_reason LIKE '%Upgrade%' ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset_movements
SELECT asset_id, from_location, to_location FROM asset_movements ORDER BY movement_ts DESC
SELECT id, movement_type FROM asset_movements WHERE movement_type = 'Transfer'
SELECT transfer_amount, from_owner, to_owner FROM asset_transfers ORDER BY transfer_ts ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT event_timestamp, user_id, event_description FROM audit_trails
SELECT id, movement_ts, from_location, to_location, movement_type FROM asset_movements WHERE movement_type = 'Transfer' ORDER BY movement_ts DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM asset_transfers WHERE transfer_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transfer_ts ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, transfer_ts, from_owner, to_owner, transfer_amount FROM asset_transfers WHERE to_owner = 'John Doe' AND transfer_amount < 5000 ORDER BY transfer_ts DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, event_timestamp, user_id, event_description FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 1234 ORDER BY event_timestamp LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM asset_movements WHERE from_location LIKE '%Warehouse%' OR to_location LIKE '%Office%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 7
SELECT * FROM AssetMovements;
SELECT asset_id, movement_date, from_location, to_location FROM AssetTransfers WHERE transfer_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT asset_id, movement_time FROM AssetMovements WHERE to_location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY movement_time DESC;
SELECT asset_id, movement_date, from_location, to_location FROM AssetMovements WHERE asset_id = 1001;
SELECT asset_id, movement_date, movement_time FROM AssetHistory WHERE event_type = 'Maintenance' ORDER BY asset_id ASC, event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssetMovements WHERE asset_id = 123 ORDER BY movement_date DESC, movement_time ASC;
SELECT asset_id, from_location, to_location FROM AssetTransfers WHERE transfer_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transfer_date, transfer_time;
SELECT asset_id, event_type, event_description FROM AssetHistory WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT audit_id, action_taken, user_id FROM AuditTrail WHERE action_date = '2022-06-30' ORDER BY user_id, action_time;

SELECT * FROM AssetMovements JOIN AssetTransfers ON AssetMovements.asset_id = AssetTransfers.asset_id WHERE AssetMovements.movement_date > '2022-01-01' AND AssetTransfers.transfer_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM asset_movements;
SELECT asset_id, from_location, to_location FROM asset_transfers WHERE transfer_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_id, action_taken, action_date FROM asset_audit_trails ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM asset_details WHERE asset_type = 'Laptop';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM asset_details
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM asset_details
SELECT asset_name, acquisition_date FROM asset_details WHERE asset_type = 'Computer'
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT asset_id, movement_type, movement_date, from_location, to_location FROM asset_movements INNER JOIN asset_transfers ON asset_movements.asset_id = asset_transfers.asset_id
